member.name: T:ConsoleApp1.Program
member.summary: This program can: 1. Print message if input integer is divideable by 2 (Fizz) or 3 (Buzz) or both (FizzBuzz) 2. Create nests subdirectories on PC 3. Create files on any nest level in subdirectories

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Program.FizzBuzz(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method returns message if input number can be divided by 2 (Fizz) or 3 (Buzz) or both (FizzBuzz)

member.name: M:ConsoleApp1.Program.DeepDive(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method is used to creating nest subdirectories
